name: A.S. Flying School
about: At A.S. Flying School, we are dedicated to providing the highest quality aviation training for both private and professional pilots. Established with a commitment to safety, our experienced instructors hold advanced pilot and instructor certificates, ensuring a pleasant, fun, and rewarding learning experience. Our personalized instruction is tailored to meet individual needs and learning abilities, with a focus on structured, organized, and time-efficient programs. With ideal training conditions and superior facilities, we strive to make each student a highly competent and safe aviator. Join us to start your journey towards a successful aviation career.
